you-do-not-have-sufficient-permissions: Вие нямате права за достъп до тази страница, моля свържете се с администратора.

title: Заглавие
this-field-can-help-describe-the-content: В това поле може да опишете съдържанието с няколко думи, но с обща дължина не повече от 150 символа.
drag-and-drop-or-click-here: Влачите и пускате или натиснете тук

to-schedule-the-content-select-the-date-: За да програмирате съдържанието, изберете датата и часа, състоянието трябва да бъде настроено на "Публикувано ".
use-this-field-to-name-your-site: Използвайте това поле за име на сайта, то ще се появи в горната част на всяка страница.
use-this-field-to-add-a-catchy-phrase: Използвайте това поле, за да добавите ключови думи и изрази за сайта.
you-can-add-a-site-description-to-provid: Можете да добавите кратко описание или биография на сайта.
you-can-add-a-small-text-on-the-bottom: Можете да добавите кратък текст в долната част на всяка страница. Например: авторско право, собственик, дати и т.н..
site-url: Адрес, на който блога е ще бъде намиран
emails-will-be-sent-from-this-address: Писмата ще бъдат изпращани от този адрес.
select-a-timezone-for-a-correct: Изберете часова зона за правилтото показване на дата / час.

confirm-delete-this-action-cannot-be-und: Ако потвърдете, действието не може да бъде отменено.
do-you-want-to-disable-the-user: Искате ли да деактивирате този потребител?
you-can-change-this-field-when-save-the-: You can change this field when save the current changes.
invite-a-friend-to-collaborate-on-your-s: Invite a friend to collaborate on your site
number-of-items-to-show-per-page: Number of items to show per page.
order-the-content-by-date-to-build-a-blo: Order the content by date to build a Blog or order the content by position to build a Website.
returning-page-when-the-page-doesnt-exis: Returning page when the page doesn't exist, leave it blank if you want to returns a default message.
returning-page-for-the-main-page: Returning page for the main page, leave it blank if you want to show all the pages on the main page.
full-url-of-your-site: Full URL of your site. Complete with the protocol HTTP or HTTPS (only if you have enabled SSL on your server).
with-the-locales-you-can-set-the-regiona: With the locales, you can set the regional user interface, such as the dates in your language. The locales need to be installed on your system.
complete-the-form-choose-a-password-for-: Попълнете формуляра, или задайте парола за потребителското име « admin »
this-is-a-brief-description-of-yourself-: Това е кратко описание на вашия сайт, за да се промени този текст отидете в админ панела, настройки плъгини, конфигуриране на плъгин About.
recommended-for-recovery-password-and-no: Recommended for recovery password and notifications.
label: Етикет
this-title-is-almost-always-used-in-the-: This title is almost always used in the sidebar of the site.
password-must-be-at-least-6-characters-l: Паролата трябва да е с дължина най-малко 6 символа
about-your-site-or-yourself: За вашия сайт или за вас
to-enable-the-user-you-must-set-a-new-pa: To enable the user you must set a new password.
delete-the-user-and-associate-his-conten: Delete the user and associate his content to admin user

congratulations-you-have-successfully-in: Congratulations you have successfully installed your **Bludit**
this-theme-may-not-be-supported-by-this-: This theme may not be supported by this version of Bludit
drag-and-drop-to-set-the-position-of-the: Drag and Drop to set the position of the plugins
change-the-position-of-the-plugins: Change the position of the plugins
example-page-1-content: Start writing your own content or edit the current to fit your needs. To create, edit or remove content you need to login to the admin panel with the username `admin` and the password you set on the installation process.
example-page-2-content: Update the settings of your site from the admin panel, you can change the title, description and the social networks from Settings > General.
example-page-3-content: Get information about news, new releases, new themes or new plugins on our social networks Facebook, Twitter and YouTube or visit our Blog.
example-page-4-content: Your About page is typically one of the most visited pages on your site, need to be simple with a few key things, such as your name, who are you, how can contact you, a small story, etc.
the-extension-zip-is-not-installed: The extension zip is not installed, to use this plugin you need to install the extension.
there-are-no-sticky-pages-at-this-moment: There are no sticky pages at this moment.
there-are-no-scheduled-pages-at-this-mom: There are no scheduled pages at this moment.
number-in-minutes-for-every-execution-of: Number in minutes for every execution of autosave.
are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-pag: Are you sure you want to delete this page?
set-a-cover-image-from-external-url,-suc: Set a cover image from an external URL, such as a CDN or some server dedicated for images.
start-typing-a-page-title-to-see-a-list-: Start typing a page title to see a list of suggestions.
field-used-when-ordering-content-by-posi: Field used when ordering content by position
write-a-template-name-to-filter-the-page: Write a template name to filter the page in the theme and change the style of the page.
write-the-tags-separated-by-commas: Write the tags separated by comma.
this-tells-search-engines-not-to-show-th: This tells search engines not to show this page in their search results.
this-tells-search-engines-not-to-follow-: This tells search engines not to follow links on this page.
this-tells-search-engines-not-to-save-a-: This tells search engines not to save a cached copy of this page.
are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-cat: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
the-nickname-is-almost-used-in-the-theme: The nickname is almost used in the themes to display the author of the content
allow-unicode-characters-in-the-url-and-: Allow Unicode characters in the URL and some part of the system.
drag-and-drop-to-sort-the-plugins: Drag and Drop to sort the plugins.
leave-empty-for-autocomplete-by-bludit: Leave empty for autocomplete by Bludit.
choose-a-password-for-the-user-admin: Choose a password for the user admin
the-content-is-saved-as-a-draft-to-publi: The content is saved as a draft. To publish it click on the button Publish or if you still working on it click on Save as draft.
there-are-no-pages-at-this-moment: There are no pages at this moment.
there-are-no-static-pages-at-this-moment: There are no static pages at this moment.
there-are-no-draft-pages-at-this-moment: There are no draft pages at this moment.
there-are-no-images-for-the-page: There are no images for the page.
this-plugin-depends-on-the-following-plu: This plugin depends on the following plugins.
file-type-is-not-supported: File type is not supported. Allowed types:
author-can-write-and-edit-their-own-cont: Author: Can write and edit their own content. Editor: Can write and edit the content of others.
define-custom-fields-for-the-content: Define custom fields for the content. Learn more about custom fields in the documentation.
start-typing-to-see-a-list-of-suggestion: Start typing to see a list of suggestions.
